body_html: Hi @wt-huang, can you link to the commit that added auto-tuning? According to my experiments, manually disabling the layout optimizer is still required in TensorFlow 1.12 to get good performance in the scenario described in this issue.
body_text: Hi @wt-huang, can you link to the commit that added auto-tuning? According to my experiments, manually disabling the layout optimizer is still required in TensorFlow 1.12 to get good performance in the scenario described in this issue.
body: Hi @wt-huang, can you link to the commit that added auto-tuning? According to my experiments, manually disabling the layout optimizer is still required in TensorFlow 1.12 to get good performance in the scenario described in this issue.
